IN EXERCISE oft he powers contained in regulation 3 oft he Control
of Goods (Import and Export) (Agriculture) Regulations, the
following Order is hereby made:
I. This Order may be cited as the Control of Goods (Import Title
andE xport) (Agriculture) (Prohibition ofI mportation) Order, 2011.
2. Subject to paragraph 3, the commodities and goods listed in Prohibition
the Schedule to this Order are banned from importation into the of

3. (I) The Minister may issue permits for the importation of Interim

of publication of this Order until a date not later than 31 st July, commodities

(2) The aggregate quantity of commodities and goods imported
in accordance with any permits issued under sub-paragraph (I)
shall not exceed twenty thousand metric tonnes.
(3) After 3I st July, 2011 any permit for the importation of the
commodities and goods specified in the Schedule shall stand revoked.
4. The Control of Goods (Import and Export) (Agriculture) Revocation
(Prohibition oflmportation) Order, 2009, is hereby revoked. ofSI.N. o .
